reviews.review: Отличная игра

Hoard wave game with an English twist to the norm. Can be repetative but fun if all you need to do is shoot down waves and waves of enemies. Great times with friends when you have them trying their best but failing miserably.

10/10 would buy again.
Definately a good bit of mindless fun :D Plenty of mods and maps to keep ypu entertained for hours on end

This is an awesome game to play with friends and so much fun even when maxing out your classes there is still the hell on earth difficulty to play on which requires a lot of teamwork. Even though the second game is out the first is still a blast with all the custom maps and weapons.

Очень залипательная игра!

Good co-op zombie survival, nice and funny events from time to time, lots of DLC (little bit overpriced, grab them with 50% off), HUGE modding community (including tons of good maps)... BUT! Killing Floor 2 "is upon us", so i suggent either to buy this game on sale, or wait for the sequel.

best game ever can't wait for killing floor 2

This Game Never Die ...:)

This game is easily one of the best games when it comes to Team-Play style games. Whether you're looking for a casual match for shit's and giggles or a hardcore match with your friends, this game will jimmy your jimmies. The gameplay is amazingly fun, the gun mechanics and reload animations are of the best i've seen in any game, and the voice acting is utterly hilarious! The community is also amazing, It has tons of community builders that create a lot of custom maps from a Zelda themed map to a teenagers room full of wondrous seecrets. It is hundreds of hours of serious fun from hardcore to casual players. Seriously buy this game. It's one of my favorites. There is no reason to NOT buy it.

7/10

Generic Zombie-Shooter Rehash with hard-to-get-into multiplayer

Good mods and fun gameplay. Worth your money if it's on sale.
Team Coop Survival with Perks!

kill a strained lady with a nail gun 
kill a guy with a blade on his right arm with an axe
kill a fucking rapist with a... rocket launcher
kill yourself


you can do that too

This game is one of the best games I have played this year!
Every time I kill a zombie I feel like I am progressing to something bigger and bigger.After every class
rank up, after every weapon bought, after every wave completed, I keep playing and playing for more
of this zombie killing fun.
      The weapons in this game are fun to use and easy to get used to! It feels so exsiting to know that 
you just got enough points the buy the weapon that you wanted to try out. From shotguns blowing zombies
limbs off, to pistols taking out the smaller zombies. Most weapons in this game you will love. PLUS, there are 
tons of weapons to choose from!
       
       Sure, the graphics arent the best.There is just so much in this game to do!
                                                                          9/10 Brilliant!

Hours of fun with an interesting variety of monsters to kill. There's always new maps and game modes (Mutations) to play.
10/10 would play for hours on end.
Hell yeah. Awesome game for just sitting back and blasting zombies. It is still good enough to keep you on your seat if that is what you are looking for.
10/10 would play again
Really nice game to play with friends but hard to make your own server.
really good game and gameplay!  a must have and better play with friends!

Really awesome game if youhave the money to spare grab it and definitly don't play alone on the harder difficulties, it has great wave based combat with a merchant to meet up with between the waves, a realistic weight system slows you down when walking the more you carry. Complimented with very neat weapons and cheap DLC this is a must in any horror or FPS Library!
Awesome game! Hope it comes to Xbox One sometime.
Play it. It's fun!!

Killing Floor is a Co-Op Survival horror game. This game has a set amount of waves leading up to the big boss and inbetween the waves you get a grace period where you can buy new weapons and more ammunition. The game is always fun to just go back to and play when there is nothing else you want to do.

I find this game much more compelling than LFD2. The combination of XP, classes, and a greater variety of weapons and enemies to be a big plus. However, the hosting and joining of games, which should be automatic in any recent game now, requires you to summon years old port forwarding and firewall knowledge to solve. 

It's worth it though. The game is a blast.
Great Game Lots of fun!!!

Com jogabilidade ótima, gráficos medianos e inteligência artificial rasoavelmente boa, Killing Floor é um ótimo jogo de survivor horror.

O coop deixa tudo mais difertido, afinal jogar com os amigos é sempre melhor.

O jogo possui dificuldades bastante variadas, isso é bom, pois até os jogadores mais inexperientes conseguiram jogar, e os jogadores mais experientes e que gostam de desafios iram adorar as dificuldades Suicide e Heel on Earth.

Há uma grande variedade de mapas, mas nem todos são bons, provavelmente você vai ter os seus poucos preferidos e irá jogar apenas neles.

A economia é ótima, o preço das armas, munição e equipamentos valem a dificuldade que você passa para conseguir o dinheiro.

Resumindo Killing Floor é um jogo ótimo, tirando alguns deslizes na interface e tela de loading, e dificilmente irá fazer você se arrepender do dinheiro gasto nele. Vale a pena comprar!

9/10

Very juvenile and immature in a lot of ways. The repetitive dialogue can be pretty annoying and the occasional bug can be a game breaker. But still! Fun as all get out, especially playing with a full time. Can get very hectic. Love the shit out of it.
good game for friends if you like FPS and achievements get this game it gose on sale a lot so thats also good
This is one hell of a game, especially when you play with friends. Though some tweaks are needed, I still love this game!

its pretty fun
Game is great. Would highly recomend for group play. Can't wait to get Killing Floor 2!
Dalo by se říci, že je to takový Counter Strike se zrůdama. Za mě palec hore, užívám si hru.
This is an all around great, solid, suvival games. Play it with friends for the most fun!
Man don i like to kill floors , dis da stuff
this game rocks for team base shooter

Killing Floor is definitely one of the best games you can get on Steam. It is extremely fun, and you can easily play it for hours.

Positives:
-Huge diversity in weapons
-can play with friends or strangers
-can choose from multiple classes, each having different perks
-a lot of cool mods out for the game
-always fun and makes you think a little bit
-hard, but in a good way
-tons of different maps to choose from

Negatives:
-if you die late in the game there's a good chance you'll continue to keep dying
-if you join in  a game late there's also a good chance you'll die
-some people might find it too hard to play alone

5/5, get this game. The negatives aren't even that bad, and they might not even apply to you depending on your skill level and experience.
This game is a lot of fun. For being fairly basic, it is very immersive. You can make it as simple or as complex as you want it to be.
I've spent many hours on this game. The best part has to be all the user created map. Also tons of fun with freinds, I recommend this game 100%

Этой игре просто нет равных в данном жанре. Туту  нас просто полнейший треш. Игра, в которой время пролетает быстрее чем в DOTA2. 
 Вы со своей командой (Стандарт - это 6 человек. Но бывают и исключения. Кол-во игроков зависит от серва) должны сдерживать волны монстров, которые становятся сильнее  с каждлй волной. У нас тут довольно-таки достаточно карт, много оружия(Некоторые из них в DLC, которые покупаем отдельно), интересный бестиарий. 
 Минусов в данной игре я найти не могу.

Though I recomend this game, I olny suggest you buy it IF YOUR FRIENDS HAVE IT ALSO.  This is a game that can only be fully enjoyed with friends, as single player lobbies can become boring quick depending on your mindset of a good time.  Very good game play.  I love the slow-mo decapitation sequence you get for popping the head off a zombie.  Graphics are good for the time and the guns and classes are familliar and work the way you'd think and hope.

Over all: 7/10
One of my favourite wave-surviving games. Extremely under-rated. Worth every penny.
6/10 basic cod zombie game with rounds and lots of fun just a little scary .3.
is good game

This is literally the best zombie game I have played since Resident Evil 4. If you want unlimited hours of gameplay and awesome maps this is hte game for you! The gameplay is awesome, if you have played Left 4 Dead it will feel familiar but Killing Floor has its own majestic feel to it. Wondering about the Coop? It's freaking insane!!

WHAT ARE YOU WAITING FOR?!!!
This game is full of the amazings.

At first, Killing Floor looks pretty mediocre. The graphics aren't as sharp as other first-person shooters and the gameplay is extremely basic - just survive a bunch of waves of monsters. There's no real story, there's no real goal except to survive, and aside from different maps, there's not a ton of variety in the game.

But as you play, that stuff either doesn't matter or contributes to your enjoyment of the game. It's GOOD that the game is simple. The graphics are good enough (there's actually something about them that adds to the game's creepiness). And when you get going with online multiplayer co-op (it has a single player mode, but co-op is by far the way to go), you'll really start to have fun. 

Killing Floor is an easy game to pick up and learn, but has enough depth, particularly with the different classes and ability leveling, that seasoned vets can continue to find things to accompish. Most of all, though, it's FUN. Replayability is outstanding. Logon, team-up, kill a bunch of monsters, and be happy.
Once you get into the system you are hooked. I play it every chance i can, it's very addictive and very satisfying when you get cornered and barely make it out alive.
Great zombie/monster killing fun! This game is great for people just like to shoot waves of monster for fun.

Отличный тайм киллер. А еще если подобрать хорошую компанию друзей вообще супер. Единственное что бесит так это куча серверов-хламов нашел для себя пару серверов нормальных там сейчас и играю. Что касается багов так тут их много некоторые бесят а некоторые нет. Больше всего например меня бесило что сколько бы я не добавлял сервер в избранное он туда не добавлялся. А также нервирует когда монстры проходят через двери (редко но бывает).
Awsome game, love the guns
Awesome game, can't wait for KF2!

awsome game,sup by the way guys.

Visceral. Brutal. Gory. But I think that the word that describes Killing Floor the best is satisfaction. Every single kill is a shot of adrenaline as you pump your shotgun and take aim at the next freaky mutant victim. When played with a bunch of friends, it becomes a real challenge without becoming too repetitive. Plus, with above-average graphics, stellar performance and special events through out the year, there's really no excuse for those Clots to keep their heads.
Definitely one of my favourite mutiplayer game ever
Это просто охуенная игра больше и сказать нечего
soo much fun

This is a surprisingly addictive coop, fps, wave-based, zombie survival.

Unlike most games Killing Floor simply acknowledges that it is a game. There are multiple types of zombies with their own unique abilities, but not anything special. The game has a good variety of guns and maps, and a perk-based leveling up tree. The amount of achievements is off the wall. With over 250 of them, it's very hard to get bored of this game.

Now, the only down side to all of these happy notes. DLC. $8 a pop for nothing but a retextures. $8 for a 4-pack of player models, that do nothing but change the way you look. $8 for a 4-pack of golden weapons that are the same as their in-game equivalents. The only thing that may be col is the community weapons pack, but even for a crossbow that shoots rotary saws... Not worth $8.

BUT, that's not an in-game problem, SO BUY KILLING FLOOR NOW!
Tons of fun! Great gunplay and variety in the maps makes me keep coming back.
Игра хорошая, но надоедает
Probably the best game to play with friends for hours on end with a great achievement system and fun seasonal events.
